actions.title: h5.metadata.campaign_missions.get
actions.description:
#### Changelog



**February 21, 2017:**

*   Renamed Endpoint from "Campaign Missions" to "Halo 5 - Campaign Missions".

actions.title: hw2.campaign_levels.get
actions.description:
#### Changelog



**February 21, 2017:**

*   Added Endpoint.

startAt.description:
When specified, this indicates the index of the item to start at.

When omitted, 0 is assumed.

When the value contains a non-digit or is not a multiple of 100, HTTP 400 ("Bad Request") is returned.

Accept-Language.description: The desired language for the Metadata.
